snippet: New guidelines being developed for U.S. hospitals treating Ebola patients will be more stringent and will direct workers to make sure their skin and hair are fully covered, a top U.S. health official said Sunday....

headline.print_headline: New Ebola Guidelines Will Be More Stringent- U.S. Health Official
headline.main: New Ebola Guidelines Will Be More Stringent- U.S. Health Official

lead_paragraph: New guidelines being developed for U.S. hospitals treating Ebola patients will be more stringent and will direct workers to make sure their skin and hair are fully covered, a top U.S. health official said Sunday.
